title: Covariance Function Estimation for High-Dimensional Functional Time Series with Dual Factor Structures. (arXiv:2401.05784v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: We propose a flexible dual functional factor model for modelling high-dimensional functional time series. In this model, a high-dimensional fully functional factor parametrisation is imposed on the observed functional processes, whereas a low-dimensional version (via series approximation) is assumed for the latent functional factors. We extend the classic principal component analysis technique for the estimation of a low-rank structure to the estimation of a large covariance matrix of random functions that satisfies a notion of (approximate) functional "low-rank plus sparse" structure; and generalise the matrix shrinkage method to functional shrinkage in order to estimate the sparse structure of functional idiosyncratic components. translated_title: 高维功能时间序列的双因子结构协方差函数估计
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一个灵活的双功能因子模型用于建模高维功能时间序列。在该模型中，将高维完全功能因子参数定义为观测功能过程，而假设低维版本（通过系列逼近）用于潜在功能因子。我们将传统的主成分分析技术扩展到估计具有（近似）功能“低秩加稀疏”结构的随机函数的大协方差矩阵的估计；并将矩阵收缩方法推广到功能收缩，以估计功能特异分量的稀疏结构。在适当的正则性条件下，推导出开发出的估计器的大样本理论，包括估计的因子和功能因子载荷的一致性以及估计的协方差函数矩阵的收敛速度。
tldr: 本文提出了一种用于高维功能时间序列建模的灵活双因子结构模型，并推广了主成分分析技术和矩阵收缩方法以有效估计协方差函数和稀疏结构。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a flexible dual factor model for high-dimensional functional time series and extends the PCA technique and matrix shrinkage method to estimate covariance functions and sparse structures effectively.
